Read at your own risk. ] When the first trailer for Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt Season 3 revealed that Titus ( Tituss Burgess ) was going to parody Beyonce's Lemonade, I was cautiously excited. Obviously Burgess was going to crush it — and he did — but a Lemonade pastiche seemed too easy, and on the surface too much of a parody, for parody's sake.
